name: mapper
description: Simple one-pager to map both xsl and jq to and from both xml and json

scripts.install-saxon: cd lib/saxon && [ -f saxon-js/SaxonJS2.js ] || (wget https://www.saxonica.com/saxon-js/download/Saxon-JS-2.2.zip && shasum -c saxon-js.sha1 && unzip Saxon-JS-2.2.zip && rm Saxon-JS-2.2.zip)
scripts.build-production: npm run install-saxon && npm install && webpack --mode=production
